subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[press]] [[down]]; to [[keep]] [[down]]
# to [[repress]]; to [[suppress]]; to [[restrain]]; to [[restrict]]
# to [[hinder]]; to [[hamper]]; to [[obstruct]]
# to [[lower]] (one's head); to [[look]] [[down]]
# [[deep]]; [[low-pitched]]
# [[sulky]]; [[depressed]]
# {{lb|zh|Min Dong}} [[muggy]]; [[sultry]]; [[humid]]

# [[however]]; [[but]]
# [[then]]; [[and]]
# {{n-g|Meaningless sentence-initial particle.}}
# {{surname|lang=zh}}
